label: A2B3_hR5_166_c_ac-001
title: Bi$_{2}$Te$_{3}$ ($C33$) Structure
comments:
(Gottfried, 1937) assigns \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC2_hR5_166_c_a_c-002}{tetradymite, Bi$_{2}$Te$_{2}$S} as the prototype for {\em Strukturbericht} symbol $C33$, but (Lange, 1939) shows that this is isostructural with Bi$_{2}$Te$_{3}$, the sulfur atom being replaced by a tellurium atom.  We will therefore retain our original designation. 
 Hexagonal settings for rhombohedral structures can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
